results.definition: a playing card in the suit that has been declared trumps
examples: the ace of trumps is a sure winner

results.definition: a brass musical instrument with a brilliant tone; has a narrow tube and a flared bell and is played by means of valves
proclaim or announce with or as if with a fanfare
(card games) the suit that has been declared to rank above all other suits for the duration of the hand
examples: a trump can take a trick even when a card of a different suit is led

results.definition: produce a sound as if from a trumpet
